item.title: Data Science in Credit Risk: Compliant Economic Cycle and Downturn Identification for PDs and LGDs Using Python
item.description: Hello, and welcome! This article is available to read on Medium. Here you will get an introduction and overview to basic Credit Risk termonology and ideas (Part 2). In the future, these articles will be embedded into this site and available for free.
